Class VerifyState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.state.GameState
it.polimi.ingsw.model.state.VerifyState
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class VerifyState extends GameState
Class representing the verification phase of a Galaxy Trucker match.

  • Constructor Details

    • VerifyState

      public VerifyState(ModelInstance model, GameModeType type, PlayerCount count, ArrayList<Player> players, iCards voyage_deck, ArrayList<Player> finish_order)
      Constructs a VerifyState object.
      Parameters:
      model - ModelInstance ModelInstance that owns this {GameState.
      type - GameModeType Ruleset of the state.
      count - PlayerCount Size of the match.
      players - Array of all players in the match.
      voyage_deck - iCards Card deck to be player in the upcoming state.
      finish_order - Array of all players, sorted in finishing order of the construction phase.

    • init

      public void init()
      Validates every Player's SpaceShip and if invalid removes them from the finish order.

    • validate

      public void validate(ServerMessage message) throws ForbiddenCallException
      Checks if all players have either finished validating or have disconnected. Validates and applies logic of a ServerMessage, transitioning the {GameState if certain conditions are satisfied.
      Specified by:
      validate in class GameState
      Parameters:
      message - ServerMessage Message to validate.
      Throws:
      ForbiddenCallException - if the model refuses the message in any sort of way.
